name: Astronaut: The Moon Eclipse
description: We will send you into space! You will have to protect our home planet from being destroyed by giant asteroids! If you agree, run to the warehouse for the spacesuit!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 2 ghz or faster proccessor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM Storage: 222 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse and monitor
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 2.3 ghz+ Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 2GB VRAM Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse and monitor
